settings.title: Podcast Room
settings.text:
Professional podcast recording space equipped with high-quality microphones, soundproofing, and recording equipment. Perfect for interviews, solo recordings, and content creation.

Features:

  • Professional audio equipment
  • Soundproof environment
  • Comfortable seating
  • Hourly booking available

settings.title: White Wall Studio 1
settings.text:
Clean white wall studio space perfect for photography, video production, and content creation. Professional lighting and ample space for your creative projects.

Features:

  • Professional lighting setup
  • Clean white background
  • Spacious area
  • Hourly booking available

settings.title: White Wall Studio 2
settings.text:
Another professional white wall studio space with similar features to Studio 1. Perfect for multiple projects or larger productions.

Features:

  • Professional lighting setup
  • Clean white background
  • Spacious area
  • Hourly booking available

settings.title: White Wall Studio 3
settings.text:
Third white wall studio space offering flexibility for your production needs. Book multiple studios for larger projects.

Features:

  • Professional lighting setup
  • Clean white background
  • Spacious area
  • Hourly booking available

settings.title: Coaching Services
settings.text:
Expert coaching sessions for content creators. Available in beginner and advanced levels to help you grow your skills and improve your content.

Options:

  • Beginner Coaching
  • Advanced Coaching
  • Personalized guidance
  • Skill development
